snippet: Hollywood studios negotiate their way through China's censorship process, Gigi Pritzker opens her own film production company, and Lance Armstrong confides in Oprah Winfrey.
abstract: Hollywood studios negotiate their way through China's censorship process, Gigi Pritzker opens her own film production company, and Lance Armstrong confides in Oprah Winfrey.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Hollywood Navigates China, and a Pritzker Heir Navigates Hollywood
